page.title: 11TRADE - THE SHOPS
page.content: The shops are grouped around the cross-roads at St Merryn.There are 2 {general stores},a{fruit shop}a{post {office},a{newsagent}, a {butchers},a {bakers},2{fish shop}s,a{garage},and 2 {gift shops. Most shops opened for{longer in the {summer}than in the winter because the {holiday - makers}bring more trade. Many shops{close at lunch - time. The grocery stores do not find it difficult to compete against larger stores in nearby towns because St. Merryn has a fairly{high permanent {population}so the shopping trade is fairly a{high all year}round. A lot of people{shop daily}for the odd thing e.g. ice- cream and get their big grocery order once a week.
